footer.text: Thank you for using Pokédex! Consider donating to a worthy cause if it is useful to you.

header.about: Would you like to learn more about Pokémons? The Pokédex is a handy tool to browse Pokémons, discover their abilities and revel in their prowess. It may not be indispensable, but it is a great addition to the Pokémon universe for new and old fans alike.

main.text: Here, you can find all kinds of Pokémons. Find out how strong they are, what they look like and all kinds of other useful information.
